unnormalised: Weather, yaar! Total gamble for farmers, especially in Maharashtra. My grandfather, Kisan kaka, always said, "Rain gods are fickle!" Remember the drought of 2018? Devastating. Even now, yields fluctuate wildly. Maybe the IARI should develop drought-resistant bajra varieties? Saw some good stuff on this around 14/02/2023. Hoping for a good monsoon this year. Fingers crossed for a good harvest by Diwali, around 12/11/2023. Let's see after 15/06/2024. Jai Kisan!
normalised: Weather, yaar! Total gamble for farmers, especially in Maharashtra. My grandfather, Kisan kaka, always said, "Rain gods are fickle!" Remember the drought of two thousand and eighteen? Devastating. Even now, yields fluctuate wildly. Maybe the I A R I should develop drought-resistant bajra varieties? Saw some good stuff on this around fourteenth february two thousand and twenty three. Hoping for a good monsoon this year. Fingers crossed for a good harvest by Diwali, around twelfth november two thousand and twenty three. Let's see after fifteenth june two thousand and twenty four. Jai Kisan!
